UserId.UserIdSegmentHelp: any non empty unique string identifying the user (such as an email address or a username).
UserId.UserReportDocumentation: Shows visits and other general metrics for every individual User ID.
UserId.VisitorsUserSubcategoryHelp: The user ID report shows visits associated with all your registered and logged in users. Understand website usage by its specific users and find out who your most and least active users are.
UserId.ThereIsNoDataForThisReportHelp: %1$sRead the user guide to learn how to generate data for this report.%2$s
UserId.UserIdDisabledSettingRequirementNote: Collection of User ID while tracking must be disabled.
